Html:
What support is there for custom navigation options? For example, removing the ability to for the user to navigate vertically using the mouse/keyboard/axis while still allowing him to navigate horizontally.

An alternative I suppose is just to be able to fix the vertical axis if this is possible?
Creating a custom ViewportRestriction based class, as discussed here, was the solution.

Hi,

you are right, and ViewportRestrictions are certainly the very thing that does what you want.

Glad that you've found a solution.

Mikhail.
